title: Gulabi Heera Haram: Diamond & Ruby Floral Necklace
materials: High Grade). Features the signature Hyderabadi Kundan Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Floral motif design inspired by traditional Deccan art. The necklace features delicate diamond-studded floral elements interspersed with rich, oval-cut rubies. The setting showcases a perfect blend of prong and bezel settings to maximize the brilliance of the diamonds and the vibrant color of the rubies.
occasions: and special occasions. A perfect statement piece for brides or attendees at a traditional South Indian ceremony (like muhurtham or seemantham)
description: This exquisite Haram combines the timeless allure of diamonds with the traditional auspiciousness of rubies (Ratnalu). Its handcrafted design and Hyderabadi Kundan Polish ensure exceptional quality and longevity. It represents a perfect fusion of traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities.
